title: Of the Homilies
text: The book of Homilies containeth a godly and wholesome doctrine, and necessary for the times, as doth the Holy Scripture ...
commentary: Article 35, “Of the Homilies”, states: The book of Homilies containeth a godly and wholesome doctrine, and necessary for the times, as doth the Holy Scripture . The commentary below is a concise study essay offering historical context, theological significance, and suggestions for further study. Historically this Article reflects the Reformation effort to retain the catholic tradition where it is scriptural while rejecting practices viewed as unscriptural. For modern readers, note how this Article shapes worship, preaching, and ethical teaching, and compare it with patristic sources and later Anglican commentators.
